DYAD: Trinidad and Tobago - Suriname

PS: 19751125-19950703 0.5 19950704-20209999 0.75

PS-UPDATE2020:

PSNOTES: Relationship begins at Suriname's independence as they are contiguous by less than 400 miles of sea. Relationship is at .75 because of mutual membership in CARICOM
